title: Mini Meatballs
directions: Combine all the ingredients and let the mixture rest in the fridge for about half an hour.
Preheat the oven to 180Â°C. Roll tablespoonfuls of the mince mixture into small meatballs between your palms.
Line a roasting pan with tin foil and spray with the cooking spray.
Bake the meatballs for about 15 minutes, turning halfway through the cooking time, or until cooked through.
